channel.title: Glm on SNR R User Group
channel.description: Recent content in Glm on SNR R User Group

item.title: Chickadee sounds and mixed effect models
item.description: Load packages # .libPaths("P:\\RLibrary2") knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) # install.packages("lme4") # install.packages("lmerTest") library(lme4) # library(lmerTest) #Dont initially load this library library(tidyverse) Load chickadee data # Download the data from google drive id <- "1NHnz1ncP-c0uGXrcE25pp_iGga0YVLuy" sarahFee<- read_csv(sprintf("https://docs.google.com/uc?id=%s&export=download", id)) ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## Location = col_character(), ## Type = col_character(), ## `Begin Time (s)` = col_double(), ## `End Time (s)` = col_double(), ## `Delta Time (s)` = col_double(), ## `Low Freq (Hz)` = col_double(), ## `High Freq (Hz)` = col_double(), ## `Delta Freq (Hz)` = col_double() ## ) glimpse(sarahFee) ## Observations: 32 ## Variables: 8 ## $ Location <chr> "Riverside", "Riverside", "Riverside", "Rive.

item.title: Heat Tolerance
item.description: Get the data heat_data <-read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chrischizinski/snr-r-group/master/data/HeatTolerance.csv", na = "NA") ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## Species = col_character(), ## `Species common name` = col_character(), ## `Trial Nr` = col_integer(), ## `Larval Stage` = col_character(), ## `Age (days post-hatch)` = col_integer(), ## `Age (degree-days)` = col_integer(), ## `Acclimation temperature (°C)` = col_integer(), ## `Larval ID` = col_character(), ## `Warming rate (°C h-1)` = col_character(), ## `Body length (mm)` = col_double(), ## `CTMax (°C)` = col_double() ## ) glimpse(heat_data) ## Observations: 478 ## Variables: 11 ## $ Species <chr> "Clupea harengus", "Clupea hare.
